conclusion: Understanding the flow of liquid through baffles to containers D, E, or F.
Baffles are labeled A, B, and C.
Baffles redirect the flow of liquid into containers D, E, or F.
Liquid from A is directed towards the left side of the image.
Liquid from A will flow into container D.
Liquid from B is directed towards the right side of the image.
Liquid from B will flow into container F.
Liquid from C is directed towards the top right side of the image.
Liquid from C is not relevant to containers D, E, or F.
Liquid from A will flow into container D and liquid from B will flow into container F.
Final answer: The liquid will flow into containers D and F.
